const genLayoutLightStyle=token=>{const{componentCls,bodyBg,lightSiderBg,lightTriggerBg,lightTriggerColor}=token;return{["".concat(componentCls,"-sider-light")]:{background:lightSiderBg,["".concat(componentCls,"-sider-trigger")]:{color:lightTriggerColor,background:lightTriggerBg},["".concat(componentCls,"-sider-zero-width-trigger")]:{color:lightTriggerColor,background:lightTriggerBg,border:"1px solid ".concat(bodyBg),// Safe to modify to any other color
borderInlineStart:0}}};};export default genLayoutLightStyle;
